title: Apsara Kundan Haaram Set with Jhumka Earrings
materials: Cultured Pearls. Features a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish.
features: Exquisitely handcrafted Kundan Haaram featuring an intricate floral design with layered motifs. The pendant showcases a central emerald stimulant surrounded by a halo of Kundan stones. Dangles of ruby stimulants and pearls add a touch of traditional charm. Complementary temple style Jhumka earrings echo the necklace's design, featuring a ruby stimulant accent and a pearl drop. Intricate filigree work enhances the antique finish.
colors: Primarily gold with white Kundan accents. Emerald green and ruby red offer a vibrant contrast
complemented by the soft luster of pearls.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali (Deepavali) and Sankranthi (Makara Sankranti)
and grand celebrations. Also suitable for upscale parties and events where a statement piece is desired.
description: This Apsara Kundan Haaram set embodies the opulence and artistry of traditional South Indian jewelry. The high-quality Kundan stones offer the brilliance of Polki diamonds at an accessible price point. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures a lasting shine and a luxurious feel. A timeless design that blends seamlessly with both traditional and contemporary attire, making it a treasured heirloom.
